title: !NOT SOLVED No Recommended answer! No ambient display on google pixel 1 Verizon Unlocked android Q!
content: So I got my pixel a couple months ago. Its the Pixel 1, not the xl. It came with android Pie and it had an option for the ambient display. When I upgraded to Android Q Beta 4 it was gone, So I downgraded back to pie. Then Beta 5 came out and I upgraded in hopes of a fix. But none. I have looked everywhere but cannot find anything for the Pixel 1. if it helps I believe its a verizon  Pixel Unlocked.
